block.p: Baseball 2007 The season preview highlights players from around the world who have migrated to the majors. With profiles of the Mets' David Wright and the Yankees' Derek Jeter, and team-by-team capsules and lineups.

Iraq Says Bomb Killed 152 The Iraqi government said 152 people were killed in the truck bombing Tuesday in Tal Afar, about double the number in early reports. At least 27 more were killed in sectarian violence yesterday.
It's Florida vs. Ohio State Florida will face Ohio State tomorrow in the final of the N.C.A.A. men's basketball tournament. The universities also played for the football title in January.
T: Design The New York Times Style Magazine looks at the many sides of Modernism, from an austere house in Arizona to a Paris apartment filled with 20th-century design classics.
Editorial: The Role of Rove Congress should focus as much on Karl Rove as on Alberto Gonzales in the United States attorneys affair.
